## ChatEventClient.on() method

Registers an event listener for a specified event. Supported events are: - `message`<!-- -->: A new message has been received. - `typing`<!-- -->: The agent is typing. - `close`<!-- -->: The chat session has been closed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
on(eventName: "message" | "typing" | "close", cb: (data: any) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

eventName


</td><td>

"message" \| "typing" \| "close"


</td><td>

The name of the event to listen to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

cb


</td><td>

(data: any) =&gt; void


</td><td>

The callback function to be executed when the event is triggered.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
